message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $18,000.  I believe it offers significant value and I'm happy to answer any questions you might have.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you be willing to consider this price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $18,000 is closer to its true value. Could you meet me halfway at $14,000?
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my position. I am still unable to meet at $14,000. Would you be willing to lower your price to $12,000?
